fields.headline: You can be here
fields.bodyText: ART2001 fair Date: January 17-21. Location: The Business Design Centre, 52 Upper Street, London N1 OQH. Description: Eclectic UK art fair where it is possible to pick up a potential masterpiece without being forced to spend Saatchi- style sums. Contact: 0870 7399500 Website: www.whatsonwhen.com Hot-Air Balloon Week Date: January 20-28. Location: Château d'Oex, Vaud, Switzerland. Description: Spectacular festival in the Alps above Lac Leman, with 80 multi-coloured balloons putting on daily displays. Contact: 0041 026 924 25 25 Website: www.whatsonwhen.com Chinese New Year Celebrations Date: January 24 - February 3. Location: Chinatown, San Francisco, US. Description: One of the oldest ethnic neighbourhoods in the US celebrates Chinese New Year with parades and fireworks. Contact: 001 415 982 3000. Website: www.whatsonwhen.com Niramekko Obisha Date: January 20. Location: Kamagata-jinja Shrine, Ichikawa-shi, Chiba, Japan. Description: Traditional Japanese stare-out competition, with punishing amounts of sake forced down the throat of the first competitor to either laugh or look away. Contact: 0081 43 225 9170 Website: www.whatsonwhen.com
